gradientButtonWhite.name: tvv7zz-gradientButtonWhite

facts: 71% of all human trafficking involves women and girls – mainly for sexual exploitation
88% of people investigated for child abuse also hurt animals
More than 1 in 3 LGBTQ Americans faced discrimination of some kind in the past year
Every year 2.12 billion tons of waste are dumped
More than 6 million animals enter shelters in the US every year

helps.text: Advance women’s rights by ending sexual violence against girls and women.
Green the planet by supporting Indigenous advocates and conserving nature.
Advance universal prosperity by enabling dignified work and guaranteeing freedom to develop.
Reduce animal pain by ending cruel human practices.
Fight for acceptance of genderqueer people and lesbian, gay, bi and queer people.
Protect those suffering from natural or man-made disasters.
Provide unrestricted financial support to artists so they can create beauty unhindered by commercial imperatives.
Return stolen wealth to Black and Indigenous Americans.
